ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Cluster Plasma Electrons and Currents Experiment (PEACE) Digital Data
ResourceHeader.Description: Data products of the Cluster Plasma Electron and Current Experiment (PEACE) instruments which have been produced or the Cluster Active Archive. The Plasma Electron And Current Experiment (PEACE) measurements of the thermal electron plasma population enable characterisation of the local plasma – its density, bulk flow, electron temperature – and electron pitch angle data reveal whether the local region is magnetically connected to regions of electron acceleration or lies between magnetic mirrors. PEACE electron data reveals whether electron pitch angle or energy scat- tering processes are active, for example as wave-particle interactions oc- cur
